title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8118.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8118.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) [Eff. until

Sept. 24, 1997, see also subd. (a) below.] Route 63. Route 63 between Route 5 and Hutton Road in the Village of

Oakfield and Towns of Batavia and Oakfield. (a) [Eff. Sept. 24, 1997, see also subd. (a) above.] Route 63. Route 63
between the Genesee-Orleans county line and the Genesee-Wyoming county line in
the Towns of Alabama, Oakfield, Batavia, Bethany, Pavilion, the City of Batavia
and the Village of Oakfield. (b) Park Road between Route 98 (NYS Thruway exit 48) and Route 63, City and Town of

Batavia. (c) Route 19 between

Interchange 47 of the New York State Thruway and the Genesee/Monroe county line
in the Village of Bergen and Towns of Bergen and LeRoy. (d) Route 98 between the New York State

Thruway (Exit 48) and the Genesee-Orleans county line in the Towns of Batavia
and Elba, the City of Batavia and the Village of Elba. (e) Route 98 (South Main Street) between Oak

Street Extension and Route 98 (Walnut Street). (f) [Eff. until Sept. 24, 1997, see also
subd. (f) below.] Route 98 (Walnut Street - Alexander Road). Route 98 (Walnut

Street - Alexander Road) between Route 98 (South Main Street) and US Route 20
in the City of Batavia and the Towns of Batavia and Alexander. (f) [Eff. Sept. 24, 1997, see also subd. (f)
above.] Route 98 (Walnut Street - Alexander Road). Route 98 (Walnut Street -
Alexander Road) between Route 33 (Oak Street Extension) and the Genesee-Wyoming
county line in the City of Batavia, Towns of Batavia and Alexander, and the

Village of Alexander. (g) Route 19
between interchange 47 of the New York State Thruway and the Genesee-Wyoming
county line in the Village of LeRoy and Towns of LeRoy and Pavilion. (h) Maltby Road from Mechanic Road to a point
0.4+- mile west of Mechanic Road in the Village of Elba and the Town of

Elba. (i) [Eff. until Aug. 29, 1990, see also subd. (i) below.]
Route 77. Route 77 between Route 63 and US Route 20 in the Towns of Alabama, Pembroke and Darien and the Village of Corfu. (i) [Eff. Aug. 29, 1990 until Sept. 24, 1997, see also subd. (i) above and
below.] Route 77. Route 77 between Route 63 and the Genesee-Wyoming county line
in the Towns of Alabama, Pembroke and Darien and in the Village of Corfu. (i) [Eff. Sept. 24, 1997, see also
subd. (i) above.] Route 77. Route
77 between Route 63 and the Genesee-Wyoming county line in the Towns of

Alabama, Pembroke and Darien and the Village of Corfu. (j) Route 5. Route 5 between the Erie-Genesee
county line and the Genesee-Livingston county line in the City of Batavia, Towns of Pembroke, Batavia, Stafford and LeRoy, and the Village of

LeRoy. (k) US Route 20. US Route 20
between Route 77 and Route 98 in the Towns of Darien and Alexander and in the

Village of Alexander. (l) Route
262. Route 262 between Route 63 and CR 19A in the Towns of Oakfield, Elba and

Byron, and the Village of Elba. (m) [Eff. until Sept. 24, 1997, see also subd. (m) below.] Route 5. Route 5 between

Route 19 and CR 2(East Bethany LeRoy Road) in the Village of LeRoy and the Town
of LeRoy. (m) [Eff. Sept. 24, 1997, see also subd. (m) above.] Repealed]
(n) CR 2 (East Bethany LeRoy Road). CR 2
(East Bethany LeRoy Road) between Route 5 and Route 63 in the Towns of LeRoy, Stafford, Pavilion and Bethany. (o) [Eff. until Jan. 29, 1992, see also subd. (o) below.] Route 63. Route 63
between CR 2 (East Bethany LeRoy Road) and Route 19 in the Towns of Bethany and

Pavilion. (o) [Eff. Jan. 29, 1992, see also subd. (o) above.] [Repealed]
(p) Route 63. Roue 63 from the

Wyoming-Genesee county line to Route 5 and 33 (Main Street), in the Towns of

Pavilion, Bethany and Batavia and in the City of Batavia. (q) [Eff. until April 14, 1993, see also
subd. (q) below.] Route 33 (Pearl Street). Route 33 (Pearl Street) from Route
33 and 98 (Oak Street Extension) to Wortendyke Road, in the City of Batavia and
the Town of Batavia. (q) [Eff. April 14, 1993, see also subd. (q) above.] Route 33 (Pearl Street) from Route
33 (Pearl Street). Route 33 and 98 (Oak Street Extension) to the Erie-Genesee
county line, in the City of Batavia, Town of Pembroke, Village of Corfu and

Town of Darien. (r) [Eff. until

June 22, 1994, see also subd. (r) below.] US Route 20. US Route 20 between the

Livingston-Genesee county line and Route 63 in the Town of Pavilion. (r) [Eff. June 22, 1994, see also subd. (r)
above.] US Route 20. US Route 20 between the Erie-Genesee county line and the

Genesee-Livingston county line, in the Towns of Darien, Alexander, Bethany, Pavilion and in the Village of Alexander. (s) Route 33. Route 33, between Route 5 and

Route 33A, in the City of Batavia, and in the Towns of Batavia, Stafford, LeRoy, Byron and Bergen. (t) Route
238. Route 238 between US Route 20 and the Genesse-Wyoming county line in the

Towns of Darien and Alexander. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8118.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
